blogPost.excerpt: Finley simplifies debt capital raise and management. Our software helps growing companies automate due diligence, ensure compliance, and streamline ongoing reporting with their capital providers.
blogPost.body: Finley simplifies debt capital raise and management. Our software helps growing companies automate due diligence, ensure compliance, and streamline ongoing reporting with their capital providers.
blogPost.title: Finley - Put your debt capital management on autopilot
blogPost.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: Finley简化了债务资本筹集和管理。我们的软件帮助成长中的公司自动进行尽职调查，确保合规性，并简化与资本提供者的持续报告。
localize.tagline: 让您的债务资本管理进入自动驾驶状态

localize.description: Finley簡化了債務資本籌集和管理。我們的軟件幫助成長中的公司自動進行盡職調查，確保合規性，並簡化與資本提供者的持續報告。
localize.tagline: 讓您的債務資本管理進入自動駕駛狀態
